title: Login Issues
body:
Hey, I am having some trouble Logging onto League Of Legends and was wondering if someone could shed some light on it for me, the problem is everytime I try to login it comes up with the (Did no receive a response from server) message, I've tried reinstalling lol but it hasn't worked and the same thin keeps happening, if anyone could help me out  would love it

- Bungie

replies.body:
lol formatting

Have you tried [changing DNS](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq4) yet to see if that works?
it doesnt work for me i try bout 5 times
What do you mean by that? Once you change your DNS, all programs will attempt to get their domain names from that server. I'm just curious, how can you classify "try bout 5 times"?
